name: Human Apocalypse: Shooter Survival
description:
A free to play shooter survival game about taking down as many humans as you can! You can choose from two weapons (gun and sword) to take down a human, those of which have six different unique variations. Get 99 points in order to unlock a special gamemode.

This game is for free because all I want is feedback on good things, bad things, and any other kinds of things. Also, if there are any problems with downloading the game, let me know ASAP. Feedback is invaluable because this is my first game, so please leave a review after playing.

- Kayden R
